document_data.mainbody:
Tuala Uwoke was a Chultan jeweler for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
Tuala Uwoke hailed from the jungles of Chult on the Chultan Peninsula, where she face some adversity, imprisonment, or slavery. After she was liberated, Tuala came across fascinating jewelry from the Sword Coast. She pursued the newfound passion for jewelry making way to the northern city of Neverwinter, were Tuala worked on her craft and by the late 15 century, began offering her services to adventurers and defenders of the Jewel of the North.
